channel.title: How to change a weapons speed
channel.description:
How do you change the speed of a weapon?
I added this new weapon, and I want to make is hit faster. How do I do that?

item.title: How to change a weapons speed
item.dc:creator: @Rixxx Rix_
item.description:
@Rixxx wrote:

Use this: http://is.gd/eJM0m because the weapon IDs are handled in a switch statement which is faster than if-else statements.

To add another weapon’s speed, add this snippet in between your switch statement:

case WEAPON_ID: return WEAPON_SPEED;

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a weapons speed

item.title: How to change a weapons speed
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

open client.java and search…

public int getbattleTimer() {

Right below it, make this line

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == XXXX){ return YYYY; }

replace XXXX with the item ID of the weapon you want to change
replace YYYY with the speed you want to set the weapon to

Weapon Attack Speeds:
1500 = Throwing Knife
2000 = Shortbow
2500 = Whip, Scimitar
3000 = Longsword
3500 = Battleaxe
4000 = 2H Sword, Maul

Just remember that you can change the value.

P.S. It only gets as fast as the value of 500. It doesnt get any faster than that.

[tt][/tt]

Read full topic
item.source: How to change a weapons speed
